bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
During our Cockpit CI creation of Fedora 26 images, the installation of pcp-selinux produces errors for the pcp-selinux package.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc26.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install pcp-selinux on Fedora 26
Actual results: Installing : pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc26.x86_64 378/503 libsemanage.map_file: Unable to open %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp (No such file or directory). libsemanage.semanage_direct_install_file: Unable to read file %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp (No such file or directory). semodule: Failed on %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp! warning: %post(pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc26.x86_64) scriptlet failed, exit status 1
pcp-3.11.8-2.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-46a9ee7f93

On a fresh install I get the following error when installing the packages from pcp-3.11.8-2.fc26:
Installing : pcp-selinux-3.11.8-2.fc26.x86_64 206/294 Failed to resolve typeattributeset statement at /var/lib/selinux/targeted/tmp/modules/400/pcpupstream/cil:13 semodule: Failed! warning: %post(pcp-selinux-3.11.8-2.fc26.x86_64) scriptlet failed, exit status 1 Non-fatal POSTIN scriptlet failure in rpm package pcp-selinux Non-fatal POSTIN scriptlet failure in rpm package pcp-selinux

Hey Dominik,
I'm unable to reproduce this on a local setup. would you be able to run /usr/libexec/selinux/hll/pp /var/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp pcpupstream.cil
and attach the resulting .cil file?

Created attachment 1264291 pcpupstream.cil from pp /var/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp
I ran the command after installing the package and produced the attached .cil file.

pcp-3.11.8-2.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
